name: Jungle Jump - Legend of the Runes
name_original: Jungle Jump - Legend of the Runes
description:
A fast paced platformer made in 48 hours for a game jam. Platforms are different colors. Each color has a different behavior. Use your special ability to swap colors of platforms and reach the runes as fast as possible.

Play time, number of deaths and number of color switches are all recorded. Try to beat it with the lowest time, deaths and color switches as possible.

Enjoy!
